text: Domingo D. Lucenario, Jr. (3 September 1960 - 8 May 2015) was a Filipino diplomat. From 2013 until his death, he was the Ambassador to Pakistan. Lucenario was born in Manila. He was married and had three children. Lucenario died on 8 May 2015 in a helicopter crash in Naltar, Gilgit-Baltistan, Pakistan. He was 54. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Accidental deaths Category:Aviation deaths Category:Ambassadors of the Philippines Category:Politicians from Manila
title: Domingo Lucenario Jr.
